title: Don’t Let These Patriots Dance Alone (Ep 1244)
description:
In this episode I address the disgraceful arrest and prosecution of a Texas business owner for opening her business and trying to feed her kids. I also address the disturbing story of the takedown of General Mike Flynn and I produce all of the evidence you need to conclude that the government has failed us. Finally, I play a terrific new campaign ad by the Trump team. 

News Picks:


A terrific opinion piece by a former FBI agent who finally acknowledges the Flynn targeting scandal. 


Adam Schiff has some serious explaining to do. 


Comey’s pals are freaking out!

The Mueller special counsel team is feeling the heat. 


The walls are closing in around failed FBI Director Christopher Wray.

The way Japanese bees deal with the “murder hornet” is brutal! 


﻿Copyright Bongino Inc All Rights Reserved.
